translations: 假寐（doze 的现在分词）；推土

sentences.sentence: He was dozing in front of the TV.
She has apparently been dozing and, having come to just as the sentence ended, was attempting to cover for her inattention.
sentences.translation: 她显然一直在打瞌睡，知道句子结束时才醒了过来，然后试图掩饰自己的心不在焉。

sentences.sentence: He was dozing lightly in his chair.
sentences.translation: 他在椅子上浅浅地打着瞌睡。
